summary: This memo discusses Valeriy Vladimirovich Kostikov's activities, including his tours in Mexico City, attempts to cultivate a U.S. Government employee, handling Lee Harvey Oswald's visa request, and alleged involvement with Central American communist parties. It also mentions his unusual trips to Moscow and Havana, his sudden departure from Mexico, and his reputation as an effective intelligence officer.
title: Valeriy Vladimirovich Kostikov Activities
